snippet: Steven A. Cohen, a hedge fund manager pursuing the purchase of the Los Angeles Dodgers, is expected to buy a limited partnership in the Mets for $20 million.
abstract: Time Warner Cable and Comcast are nearing a plan to finance SNY cable network’s purchase of four shares in the New York Mets, worth $80 million; Steven A Cohen, hedge fund manager pursuing the purchase of the Los Angeles Dodgers, is expected to buy a limited partnership in the Mets for $20 million.
lead_paragraph: Steven A. Cohen, a hedge fund manager pursuing the purchase of the Los Angeles Dodgers, is expected to buy a limited partnership in the Mets for $20 million.

headline.seo: Financial Relief for Mets May Come From TV Partners
headline.main: Financial Relief for Mets May Come From TV Partners
headline.print_headline: Financial Relief for Mets May Come From TV Partners
